docs/realistic_test_report.md.content: Comprehensive GUI test report for FlutterReflect testing framework

patterns_discovered: Systematic GUI component inventory approach with tracking matrix
MCP protocol integration pattern for Flutter testing
Widget tree comparison for state change detection
Realistic user workflow simulation across multiple screens
Component key-based selector strategy for reliable UI interaction
Verification pattern using multiple MCP tools in sequence
State detection via property comparison and tree analysis
End-to-end testing spanning multiple screens and interactions
gotchas_discovered: Complex widget tree structure requires careful node identification
Timing delays critical for UI state synchronization (200-1000ms intervals)
Component key naming conventions must be consistent for reliable testing
Confirmation dialogs require additional tap handling
Screen transitions need longer wait times (1 second) for complete rendering
Property names can vary between widget types (controllerText vs text)
Empty state handling needs explicit verification
Batch operations (mark all complete, clear all) require significant UI update time

approach_outcome.methodology: Comprehensive GUI testing using MCP protocol with FlutterReflect tools
approach_outcome.effectiveness: Production-ready testing that detects UI/UX issues invisible to conventional Flutter widget testing
key_achievements: All UI components across Home and Stats screens are testable

recommendations: Implement automated test execution in CI/CD pipeline
Create test data management system for realistic scenarios
Add performance metrics tracking for test execution times
Create modular test case templates for common patterns
Add error recovery mechanisms for intermittent UI failures
